Interface Rule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ace, AKQJunsuited, Flush, FourOfAKind, FourToInsideStraight, FourToOutsideStraight, FourToStraightFlush, FullHouse, HighPair, JackQueenOrKing, JTsuited, KJunsuited, KQJunsuited, KQunsuited, KTsuited, LowPair, NToFlush, NToRoyalFlush, QJunsuitedOrSuited, QTsuited, RoyalFlush, Straight, StraightFlush, ThreeAces, ThreeOfAKind, ThreeToFlushNHighCards, ThreeToStraightFlush, TwoPair, TwoSuitedHighCards

    public interface Rule
    Interface to fetch a list of cards from an array of cards needed for a given draw

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Card> run(Card[] c, Occurrences occurrences)
      Obtain which cards should be held in order to fulfil a given draw

    • Method Detail

      • run

        java.util.List<Card> run(Card[] c,
                         Occurrences occurrences)
        Obtain which cards should be held in order to fulfil a given draw
        Parameters:
        c - The array of cards to be checked
        occurrences - An initialised Occurrences object
        Returns:
        The list of cards needed for a given draw
